Package de.oth.blocklib.networking

Class ClientNetworkManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.NetworkManager
de.oth.blocklib.networking.ClientNetworkManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkConnection
public class ClientNetworkManager
extends NetworkManager
implements NetworkConnection
Manager class for the client's network operations.
Get an instance by using the NetworkManagerBuilder.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

      Connect to a blocklib server.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Return whether the client is currently connected. This depends on whether data was received from server in the last Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout milliseconds. If Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout is 0, this method returns true.
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface NetworkConnection
      Returns:
      true if the client is currently connected
      See Also:
      NetworkConnection.isConnected()

    • send

      public void send​(NetworkMessage message)
      Send a message to the server the NetworkManager is connected to.
      Does nothing if the NetworkManager is not connected.
      Specified by:
      send in interface NetworkConnection
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      See Also:
      NetworkConnection.send(NetworkMessage)

    • registerMessageListener

      public void registerMessageListener​(java.lang.Class<? extends NetworkMessage> messageClazz, NetworkManager.MessageListener messageListener)
      Register a listener which is called when a message of a certain type is received.
      Parameters:
      messageClazz - trigger when a message of this class is received; use NetworkMessage to get notified for every type of message
      messageListener - the listener to call when a message was received

    • unregisterMessageListener

      public void unregisterMessageListener​(java.lang.Class<? extends NetworkMessage> messageClazz, NetworkManager.MessageListener messageListener)
      Unregister a previously registered listener.
      Parameters:
      messageClazz - the message type of the previously registered listener
      messageListener - the previously registered listener

      public void registerMessageAcknowledgedListener​(NetworkManager.AcknowledgeListener messageAcknowledgedListener)
